brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts examples of the types of traffic found on converged networks to demonstrate that all traffic is not alike.
Real-time traffic
- Voice over IP (V o IP)
- Videoconferencing
Web content
- Browsing
- Shopping
Transactional traffic
- Order processing and billing
- Inventory and reporting
- Accounting and reporting
Streaming traffic
- Video on demand (V o D)
- Movies
Bulk traffic
- E-mail
- Data backups
- Print files
